description: Starts the workflow when Cisco Webex events occur.

properties.name: resolveData
properties.description: By default the response only contain a reference to the data the user inputed. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically.

properties.name: filters
properties.description: Whether to limit to messages which contain file content attachments

properties.name: isLocked
properties.description: Whether to limit to rooms that are locked

properties.name: isModerator
properties.description: Whether to limit to moderators of a room

properties.name: mentionedPeople
properties.description: Limit to messages which contain these mentioned people, by person ID; accepts me as a shorthand for your own person ID; separate multiple values with commas

properties.name: messageId
properties.description: Limit to a particular message, by ID

properties.name: personEmail
properties.description: Limit to a particular person, by email

properties.name: personId
properties.description: Limit to a particular person, by ID

properties.name: roomId
properties.description: Limit to a particular room, by ID

properties.name: callType
properties.description: Limit to a particular room type
